Item ID2526

Grey toy horseys are items made as a joke by Jagex, poking fun at the requests made by players to have horses. Toy horseys are obtainable from Diango for 150 coins, and come in 4 different colours: white, black, grey, and brown. They can also be made from a plank on any crafting table in a player owned house, which requires level 10 or higher Crafting.

Players can play with the horsey. Their character will play with the toy horsey and say, "Just say neigh to gambling!"

A player playing with a grey toy horsey.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 December 2014
(update)

Fixed a typo on a toy horse.

10 December 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Toy horsey" to "Grey toy horsey".

18 March 2013
(update)

As part of a policy change on unofficial gambling games, using a horsey will always cause the player to say "Just say neigh to gambling!".

Previously, on using a horsey a player would randomly say one of the following phrases: "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!", "Hi-ho Silver, and away" or "Neaahhhyyy! Giddy-up horsey!"

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

[[File:Grey toy horsey detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Grey toy horseys''' are items made as a joke by [[Jagex]], poking fun at the requests made by players to have horses. Toy horseys are obtainable from [[Diango]] for 150 coins, and come in 4 different colours: white, black, grey, and brown. They can also be made from a [[plank]] on any [[crafting table]] in a [[player owned house]], which requires level 10 or higher [[Crafting]].

Players can play with the horsey. Their character will play with the toy horsey and say, "Just say neigh to gambling!"

[[File:Grey toy horsey.gif|left|thumb|A player playing with a grey toy horsey.|220px]]
